name: The Turtle, the Vulture and the Tiger: godot wild jam's very rough cut
name_original: The Turtle, the Vulture and the Tiger: godot wild jam's very rough cut
description:
The Turtle, the Vulture and the Tiger : godot wild jam's very rough cut is a top-down 2D adventure game. Being inspired by games such  as Earthbound and Don't Starve. Having to venture around the land to find mushrooms to eat, and items to give.

Controls:

Movement: Left Mouse Button

Pick Items: Left Mouse Button

Use Inventory: i

Credits:

gorrgolem: Game Designer/Art

Jonas1426: Project Manager/Programmer/Audio mixer

manofleisure: Music ( www.lukegraymusic.com )

ImperialBrake78: Character Sprite/Dialogue Writer

Flynnja: SFX ( www.joshuaflynnsounddesign.com )

thel0stninja: Programmer

Mouse cursor from some 2d free-assets
